DOC.brief_summary: This clinical observational study investigates the incidence of wound healing abnormalities in patients undergoing major abdominal surgery. Second aim of the study is, if wound healing deficits may be accompanied by abnormalities in blood coagulation parameters.
DOC.brief_title: Wound Healing Abnormalities in Major Abdominal Surgery
DOC.criteria: Age >= 18 years Male or female Informed consent Major abdominal surgery Preexisting coagulation abnormalities Preexisting severe renal or liver failure Chemo or radiochemotherapy
DOC.keyword: wound healing after major abdominal surgery
